message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and this price reflects its true value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your constraints but I can't accept anything below $11,000. This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose an offer of $10,500. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
